advancements.zombie_kit.title: Zombie Kit
block.zombiekit.charger.description_1: §7§oPlace the battery with a wrench in the off hand.
block.zombiekit.mortar_rack.description: §7§oSupplying shells for nearby mobs using mortars.
block.zombiekit.uwr.description_1: §7§oReplace the battery with a wrench in the off hand.
block.zombiekit.uwr.description_2: §7§oBooting with right click after place it.
death.attack.barbed_wire: %1$s was poked to death by a barbed wire.
death.attack.barbed_wire.item: %1$s was poked to death by a barbed wire while trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.barbed_wire.player: %1$s was poked to death by a barbed wire while trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.heavy_machine_gun.item: %1$s was shot to pieces while trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.heavy_machine_gun.player: %1$s was shot to pieces while trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.heavy_machine_gun_bypass_ar: %1$s was shot to pieces while trying to escape %2$s
%1$s was shot to pieces while trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.wrench: %1$s was smashed to death by a wrench.
death.attack.wrench.item: %1$s was smashed to death by a wrench while trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.wrench.player: %1$s was smashed to death by a wrench while trying to escape %2$s
entity.zombiekit.drone.switch_1: Set to aggression mode. Will attack all other players.
entity.zombiekit.drone.switch_2: Set to defense mode. Will only attack hostile mobs.
gui.zombiekit.shortwave_radio_gui.title: Short Wave Radio
item.zombiekit.aokinao.description: §d§oEven in the longest night, there are still auroras; as long as you don't stop moving forward, the road will continue to extend...
item.zombiekit.burning_battle_parts.desc: §7§oEach attack has a small chance to deal a small amount of additional §r§4§oflame§r§7§o slashing damage and §r§4§oignite§r§7§o the target for a short time.
§7§oEach attack has some chance to deal a moderate amount of additional §r§4§oflame§r§7§o slashing damage and §r§4§oignite§r§7§o the target for a short time.
§7§oEach attack has a moderate chance to deal a considerable amount of additional §r§4§oflame§r§7§o slashing damage and §r§4§oignite§r§7§o the target for a certain duration.
item.zombiekit.burning_charging_parts.de: §7§oWhen fully charged, immediately deal a moderate amount of §r§4§oflame§r§7§o slashing damage to all targets in a cone-shaped area and §r§4§oignite§r§7§o the targets for a longer time.
§7§oWhen fully charged, immediately deal a considerable amount of §r§4§oflame§r§7§o slashing damage to all targets in a cone-shaped area and §r§4§oignite§r§7§o the targets for a longer time.
§7§oWhen fully charged, immediately deal a large amount of §r§4§oflame§r§7§o slashing damage to all targets in a cone-shaped area and §r§4§oignite§r§7§o the targets for a longer time.
item.zombiekit.canned_beans.description: §7§oSigh, at least tonight we can have Hoover stew!
item.zombiekit.canned_beef_hotpot.descri: §7§oMeat for one day, leftovers for another, and noodles for yet another.
item.zombiekit.canned_fish_in_black_bean: Canned Fried Dace with Salted Black Beans
§7§oThe jewel in the crown of the canned food industry.
item.zombiekit.canned_luncheon_meat.desc: §7§oEven the spam has finally turned into something too expensive to afford.
item.zombiekit.canned_tomatoes.descripti: §7§oDammit! How come there’s no macaroni here?
item.zombiekit.canned_yellow_peach.descr: §7§oMay the Canned Peach God still bless the health of every child.
item.zombiekit.chainsaw.description_1: §7§oRight click to turn on the chainsaw and attack.
item.zombiekit.chainsaw.description_2: §7§oShift + right click to turn off the chainsaw and change the battery.
item.zombiekit.compressed_biscuit.descri: §7§oIn the apocalypse, a box of hardened ration crackers could be traded for four chunks of coarse black bread.
item.zombiekit.exo.forbidden_fly_mode: The flight Mode Has Been Forbidden!
item.zombiekit.exo.no_reactive_armor: This mode can't enable reactive armor
item.zombiekit.extend_weighted_parts.des: §7§oSlightly extends reach (sweeping weapons' range halved, but slightly widens sweep), at the cost of slower attacks and reduced damage.
§7§oModerately extends reach (sweeping weapons' range halved, but moderately widens sweep), at the cost of slower attacks and reduced damage.
§7§oGreatly extends reach (sweeping weapons' range halved, but greatly widens sweep), at the cost of slower attacks and reduced damage.
item.zombiekit.freezing_battle_parts.des: §7§oEach attack has a small chance to deal a small amount of additional §r§3§ofrost§r§7§o damage and apply §r§3§ofrost§r§7§o effect to the target for a short time
§7§oEach attack has some chance to deal a moderate amount of additional §r§3§ofrost§r§7§o damage and apply the §r§3§ofrost§r§7§o effect to the target for a short time.
§7§oEEach attack has a moderate chance to deal a considerable amount of additional §r§3§ofrost§r§7§o damage and apply the §r§3§ofrost§r§7§o effect to the target for a certain duration.
item.zombiekit.freezing_charging_parts.d: §7§oWhen fully charged, immediately deal a moderate amount of §r§3§ofrost§r§7§o damage to all targets in a cone-shaped area and apply §r§3§ofrost§r§7§o effect to the targets for a longer time.
§7§oWhen fully charged, immediately deal a considerable amount of §r§3§ofrost§r§7§o damage to all targets in a cone-shaped area and apply §r§3§ofrost§r§7§o effect to the targets for a longer time.
§7§oWhen fully charged, immediately deal a large amount of §r§3§ofrost§r§7§o damage to all targets in a cone-shaped area and apply §r§3§ofrost§r§7§o effect to the targets for a longer time.
item.zombiekit.heavy_machine_gun.descrip: §7§oLeft click to fire with bullets in your inventory and Shift + Right click to turn gun.
item.zombiekit.heavy_weighted_parts.desc: §7§oImprove Durability Slightly, Increase Weapon Stability Slightly, But Decrease Swing Speed.
§7§oImprove Durability Moderately, Increase Weapon Stability Moderately, But Decrease Swing Speed.
§7§oImprove Durability Significantly, Increase Weapon Stability Significantly, But Decrease Swing Speed.
item.zombiekit.iron_curtain: Electric Energy Column of Time Machine
item.zombiekit.iron_curtain.description: §7§oThere are no instructions on it, so it's just a souvenir.
item.zombiekit.knife.description: §7§oRight-click to sneak up on an enemy that hasn't noticed you.
item.zombiekit.konn_gara.description: §7§o--This disk stores a piece of music that is 10^112 bytes in size.
item.zombiekit.kyoko.description: §7§oAn apricot that doesn't rot for some reason, but on second thought, isn't the food here supposed to be non-perishable?
item.zombiekit.level_limit: §7§oOnly can use primary and improved parts
item.zombiekit.lhx_qing.description: §c§o"Once I encountered the Fire Dragon Lord, a sword was bestowed that has since been my companion."
item.zombiekit.light_weighted_parts.desc: §7§oImprove Durability Slightly, Increase Attack Speed Slightly, But Decrease Weapon Stability.
§7§oImprove Durability Moderately, Increase Attack Speed Moderately, But Decrease Weapon Stability.
§7§oImprove Durability Significantly, Increase Attack Speed Significantly, But Decrease Weapon Stability.
item.zombiekit.mortar.description_1: §7§oCtrl + Wheel to adjust the angle after riding.
item.zombiekit.mortar.description_3: §7§oIf the mob control it, a spyglass can be used to call for fire coverage nearby.
item.zombiekit.mortar.description_with_s: §7§oWith Superb Warfare, drones can be used to call for fire coverage by pressing Ctrl + Left Click.
item.zombiekit.saltpeter_soil.descriptio: §7§oPlacing it into a cauldron filled with water and heating it will yield saltpeter.
item.zombiekit.shooting_parameters_table: §7§oProvide the basic shooting parameters for mortar fire.
item.zombiekit.sona_bakemono.description: §0§oIt is an unrequited love, a gritted-teeth resentment, a cry of yearning at the edge of exhaustion, a regret too profound to revisit. Flames ignite, flames congeal, bearing witness to the existence that once was life.
item.zombiekit.uv_lamp.description_1: §7§oReplace the battery or repair with plastic with a wrench in the off hand.
item.zombiekit.uv_lamp.description_2: §7§oCharges when it receives a redstone signal and works when it doesn't.
item.zombiekit.white_food.description_1: §7§oChainmail armor and white coat featuring a large rendition of the holy symbol of the sun.
item.zombiekit.white_food.description_2: §7§oThe choice attire of a singular Knight of Sunlight from a previous age. The symbol was painted by the knight himself, but the armor never bore any special power, sacred or otherwise.
item.zombiekit.wrench.description: §7§o“Why don't you ask... the Magic Wrench?”
zombiekit.gui.book.landing_text: This is what you found on a corpse. Following the lockdown in the northeast, post-apocalyptic survival books surged. This one emerged six months after, gaining massive popularity due to its realism and comprehensive advice.
zombiekit.gui.book.name: ZOMBIE Survival 101
zombiekit.gui.book.subtitle: By Jim Bob Corbin
zombiekit.message.response1: We are survivors. We are broadcasting on all AM frequencies. Our shelter is located at (%s, %s). If you are out there, if anyone is out there, We can provide food. We can provide shelter. We can provide security. If there is anybody out there, anybody... Please. you are not alone.
